Posts.Content: Hi I used the cold cap I will be having my third FEC on Thursday,I lost lots of hair after the 1st treatment all at the sides and I decided not to continue with cols cap. But I was not told to wet my hair before or use the conditioner. I found the cancerhaircare.com website very informative. I worked at the lister 20 years ago. But now live in west sussex. I have two wigs and wear lots of different scarfs Anette
Posts.Title: A Cold cap - did it work for you?
